content: this baby blanket is worked primarily in tunisian full stitch creating a structured yet soft fabric with subtle texture and gentle color changes the blanket is finished with a simple crochet border worked in half_double_crochet in the third loop for a clean knit like ribbing tunisian crochet hook with long cable 9 mm crochet hook 6 mm to create the border crochet hook 10 mm optional for foundation chain yarn needle to weave in ends stitches used chain tfs slip_stitch half_double_crochet yarn requirements diy handmade tilly tweed aran weight color a 2 balls 520 m / 568 yds color b 1 ball 260 m / 284 yds colors are not named on the yarn label the sample shown uses grey for color a and white for color b this yarn may not be available in all regions but any aran weight yarn may be substituted tilly tweed is approximately 8 wpi when substituting yarns be sure to check gauge to ensure sufficient yardage to complete the project
